ygData.subject: Re: stupid question
ygData.msgSnippet: You should also /con them.  There are quests where the npc will talk to you but ignore your turn in s if your faction is too low.  Or you could have lowered
ygData.messageBody:
You should also /con them. There are quests where the npc will talk
to you but ignore your turn in's if your faction is too low. Or you
could have lowered your faction without knowing it. Been there, done
that! :(

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Nefrahari@a... wrote:
> Okay this question is very stupid but I haven't done a lot of the
quests so I
> don't know. When you go to turn in your quest items, do you need to
hail the
> person first? Because when I just gave them the items, they took
them but I
> got no rewards. So I'm guessing that happened because I didn't hail
them first
> but wanted to be sure that was the reason.
>
> "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
